languages.text: "Арбитры, говорите... я совсем недавно помог{mf||ла} вашим с одним еретиком, похитившим десятину".
"I recently assisted the Adeptus Arbites in dealing with a heretic who had stolen a tithe shipment."
languages.original_text: "Арбитры, говорите... я совсем недавно помог{mf||ла} вашим с одним еретиком, похитившим десятину".

traits.locale_text: "I recently assisted the Adeptus Arbites in dealing with a heretic who had stolen a tithe shipment."

languages.text: « J'ai récemment aidé l'Adeptus Arbites à éliminer un hérétique qui avait volé une cargaison de dîme. »
languages.original_text: "I recently assisted the Adeptus Arbites in dealing with a heretic who had stolen a tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai récemment aidé l'Adeptus Arbites à éliminer un hérétique qui avait volé une cargaison de dîme. »

languages.text: «Hace poco, ayudé al Adeptus Arbites a lidiar con un hereje que había robado un envío de diezmo».
languages.original_text: "I recently assisted the Adeptus Arbites in dealing with a heretic who had stolen a tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: «Hace poco, ayudé al Adeptus Arbites a lidiar con un hereje que había robado un envío de diezmo».

languages.text: “前不久，我刚刚协助法务部成员解决了某个盗窃什一税的异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "I recently assisted the Adeptus Arbites in dealing with a heretic who had stolen a tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: “前不久，我刚刚协助法务部成员解决了某个盗窃什一税的异端分子。”

languages.text: "Ich habe dem Adeptus Arbites kürzlich geholfen, einem Ketzer das Handwerk zu legen, der eine Zehntlieferung gestohlen hatte."
languages.original_text: "I recently assisted the Adeptus Arbites in dealing with a heretic who had stolen a tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe dem Adeptus Arbites kürzlich geholfen, einem Ketzer das Handwerk zu legen, der eine Zehntlieferung gestohlen hatte."

languages.text: 「最近、租税貨物を盗んだ異端者に対処するため、高等裁定局を手助けしたんだ」
languages.original_text: "I recently assisted the Adeptus Arbites in dealing with a heretic who had stolen a tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: 「最近、租税貨物を盗んだ異端者に対処するため、高等裁定局を手助けしたんだ」

languages.text: "Bir süre önce Adeptus Arbites'in aşar sevkiyatını çalan bir kâfirle başa çıkmasına yardımcı olmuştum."
languages.original_text: "I recently assisted the Adeptus Arbites in dealing with a heretic who had stolen a tithe shipment."

traits.locale_text: "Bir süre önce Adeptus Arbites'in aşar sevkiyatını çalan bir kâfirle başa çıkmasına yardımcı olmuştum."
